short_summary: Veterans Affairs Canada is looking to source prefabricated private conference rooms.
description: This solicitation cancels and supersedes previous solicitation #51019-240535/A dated December 21, 2023, and is for the end-users with a requirements for the supply, delivery and installation of prefabricated private conference rooms. This document contains a security requirement.
full_summary:
****
**RFI Notice**
  
[RFQ Title]
Prefabricated Private Conference Rooms

**Tender Information**

* Reference Number: WS4362861277-Document4396271943
* Solicitation Number: WS4362861277
* Tender Closing Date: February 13, 2024, 2:00 p.m. (EST)
* Tender Status: Expired

**Notice Type**
Request for Proposal (RFP) - Democratic tendering method

**Goods/Services Requirements**
The Department of Veterans Affairs Canada requires suppliers to provide prefabricated private conference rooms. The goods/services requirements include:

* Supply, delivery, and installation of prefabricated private conference rooms
* Security requirements (refer to tender document for details)

**Procurement Category**
Goods (Construction Materials)

**Procurement Method**
Competitive - Selective Tendering

**Selection Criteria**
The tender will be awarded to the supplier offering the lowest price.

**Contract Information**
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada
* End-User Entity: Department of Veterans Affairs (VAC)
* End-User Entity Address: 2323 Riverside Dr, #1, Ottawa, ON, K1H 1A1, Canada
* Contact Information:
  * Name: Kristelle LeBlanc
  * Email: kristelle.leblanc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
  * Contact URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18528563?extsite=MTg1Mjg1NjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
